member.summary: The base class for entities whos changes should be tracked and stored

member.name: P:Penguin.Cms.Entities.AuditableEntity.AuditLogChanges

member.name: P:Penguin.Cms.Entities.AuditableEntity.DateDeleted
member.summary: The date the entity was deleted. Also used to determine if the entity IS deleted

member.name: P:Penguin.Cms.Entities.AuditableEntity.DateModified
member.summary: The date the entity was last modified

member.name: P:Penguin.Cms.Entities.AuditableEntity.IsDeleted
member.summary: A quick way to check if the DateDeleted has a value

member.summary: The base Penguin.Entity class containing all the information/Keys for the Penuin CMS

member.name: P:Penguin.Cms.Entities.Entity.ExternalId
member.summary: The external ID for this entity intended to be used to look it up by users

member.summary: Used to store/retrieve the full name of the type to the database

member.name: M:Penguin.Cms.Entities.Entity.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Checks if the objects are equal using Guid

member.name: P:Penguin.Cms.Entities.Entity.DateCreated
